We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private RateOfChangePercent _rocp;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_rocp = ROCP(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_rocp.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROCP Period", _rocp.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ROCP Current", _rocp.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.rocp = self.ROCP(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.rocp.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROCP Period", self.rocp.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ROCP Current", self.rocp.Current);
